plot: Masako appears incognito and revives suppressed memories within Himari, showing her she is adopted and who her true soulmate is.
title: "Mawaru-Penguindrum" My Fated One
plot_es: Masako appears incognito and revives suppressed memories within Himari, showing her she is adopted and who her true soulmate is.
plot_en: Masako appears incognito and revives suppressed memories within Himari, showing her she is adopted and who her true soulmate is.
